mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STWD_LNM FROM WAM_STWD WHERE UPPER(STWD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(STWD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY STWD_LNM )TBL LIMIT 0,10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DMN_LNM FROM WAM_DMN WHERE UPPER(DMN_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(DMN_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY DMN_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_SDITM WHERE UPPER(SDITM_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SDITM_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY SDITM_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SYMN_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SYMN_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SYMN_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY SYMN_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SBSWD_LNM FROM WAM_SYMN WHERE UPPER(SBSWD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SBSWD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY SBSWD_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUBJ_LNM FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE (UPPER(SUBJ_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SUBJ_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%')) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ORDER BY SUBJ_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY PDM_TBL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_TBL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_TBL WHERE UPPER(PDM_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(PDM_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY PDM_TBL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_TBL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_COL_LNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE UPPER(PDM_COL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(PDM_COL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY PDM_COL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_COL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PDM_COL_LNM FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_COL WHERE UPPER(PDM_COL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(PDM_COL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY PDM_COL_LNM ORDER BY PDM_COL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DBC_TBL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_TBL_KOR_NM AS DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_TBL WHERE UPPER(DBC_TBL_KOR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DBC_TBL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_TBL_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT BIZ_AREA_PNM AS BIZ_AREA_LNM FROM WAM_BIZ_AREA WHERE UPPER(BIZ_AREA_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY BIZ_AREA_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT DQI_PNM AS DQI_LNM FROM WAM_DQI WHERE UPPER(DQI_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY DQI_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT CTQ_PNM AS CTQ_LNM FROM WAM_CTQ WHERE UPPER(CTQ_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY CTQ_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_SCH_PNM AS DB_SCH_LNM FROM WAA_DB_SCH WHERE UPPER(DB_SCH_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_SCH_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DBC_COL_NM UNION ALL SELECT DBC_COL_KOR_NM AS DBC_COL_NM FROM WAT_DBC_COL WHERE UPPER(DBC_COL_KOR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DBC_COL_KOR_NM ORDER BY DBC_COL_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BR_NM FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE UPPER(BR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY BR_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT SHD_PNM AS SHD_LNM FROM WAM_SHD_MSTR WHERE UPPER(SHD_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') ORDER BY SHD_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USER_NM FROM WAA_USER WHERE UPPER(USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY USER_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BR_NM AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_BR_MSTR WHERE UPPER(BR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[스키마수집]', DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR '[스키마수집]' LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[', C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM, ']', A.DBC_TBL_NM, '.', A.OBJ_NM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', 'PC', '%') AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('[', C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM, ']', A.OBJ_NM) AS OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_COMM_DTL_CD C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.PRF_KND_CD = C.COMM_DTL_CD AND COMM_DCD_ID = 'OBJ_00000000342' WHERE A.PRF_KND_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', 'PT', '%') AND UPPER(C.COMM_DTL_CD_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(A.OBJ_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') UNION ALL SELECT ETC_JOB_NM FROM WAM_SHD_JOB WHERE UPPER(ETC_JOB_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY OBJ_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS DB_CONN_TRG_LNM FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG WHERE UPPER(DB_CONN_TRG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DB_CONN_TRG_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DEPT_NM FROM WAA_DEPT WHERE UPPER(DEPT_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DEPT_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') UNION ALL SELECT DMNG_PNM AS DMNG_LNM FROM WAA_DMNG WHERE UPPER(DMNG_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY DMNG_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MENU_NM FROM WAA_PRGM_MENU WHERE UPPER(MENU_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231','%Y%m%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ORDER BY MENU_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_LNM UNION ALL SELECT DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TSF_TBL WHERE UPPER(DDL_TBL_LNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(DDL_TBL_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DDL_TBL_PNM ORDER BY DDL_TBL_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_NM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_NM UNION ALL SELECT SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM AS DDL_TBL_LNM FROM SLC_GLOSSARY_M WHERE UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY SLC_GLOSSARY_ENG_NM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APP_STWD_LNM FROM WAM_APP_STWD WHERE UPPER(APP_STWD_LNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(APP_STWD_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY APP_STWD_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT APP_SDITM_LNM FROM WAM_APP_SDITM WHERE UPPER(APP_SDITM_LNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(APP_SDITM_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY APP_SDITM_LNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_TBL_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_COL_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TGT_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_COD_MAP WHERE UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') OR UPPER(TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY TGT_TBL_PNM ) LIMIT 0,10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DDL_SEQ_PNM FROM WAM_DDL_SEQ WHERE UPPER(DDL_SEQ_PNM) LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{searchTerm} , '%') GROUP BY DDL_SEQ_PNM ) TBL LIMIT 0,10
